programme.title: Gran Turismo
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old Jann Mardenborough beats thousands of other gamers in the GT Academy competition organised by marketing executive Danny Moore. His prize is an opportunity to sit behind the wheel of a real racing car after intensive training from cynical former driver Jack Salter. Drama, starring David Harbour, Orlando Bloom and Archie Madekwe Neill Blomkamp - Director Archie Madekwe - Jann Mardenborough David Harbour - Jack Salter Orlando Bloom - Danny Moore Djimon Hounsou - Steve Mardenborough Darren Barnet - Matty Davis Geri Halliwell - Lesley Mardenborough.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: An assassin tries to make amends in an attempt to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer. Director/Producer John Woo's remake of his namesake 1989 thriller, starring Nathalie Emmanuel, Omar Sy and Sam Worthington John Woo - Director Nathalie Emmanuel - Zee Omar Sy - Sey Sam Worthington - Finn Diana Silvers - Jenn Said Taghmaoui - Prince Majeb Bin Faheem Eric Cantona - Gopal Tcheky Karyo - Tessier.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-April 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: In the Stone Age, a gang of early humans face a mystical being hellbent on hunting them down. Prehistoric horror, starring Iola Evans and Arno Lüning. The dialogue is in a specially contructed language and features subtitles Andrew Cumming - Director Chuku Modu - Adem Kit Young - Geirr Safia Oakley-Green - Beyah Iola Evans - Avé Arno Lüning - Odal Luna Mwezi - Heron.

programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: A group of students unknowingly release an unspeakable evil trapped within a cursed deck of tarot cards. programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Swashbuckling historical adventure sequel starring François Civil, Vincent Cassel and Eva Green. After his love Constance is kidnapped, young musketeer D'Artagnan sets out to rescue her, aided by the mysterious spy Milady de Winter, who's recently broken out of prison. Meanwhile, Porthos, Aramis and Athos are on their own mission.. programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: A mercenary is assigned a target on a flight, but when rival assassins board the plane, the hunter and the hunted are forced to team up. Action thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Katee Sackhoff and Julian Kostov James Madigan - Director Josh Hartnett - Lucas Reyes Charithra Chandran - Isha Katee Sackhoff - Katherine Brunt Julian Kostov - Aaron Hunter Marko Zaror - Cayenne Juju Chan Szeto - Master Lian Danny Ashok - Royce.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: Fantasy comedy starring Adam Sandler, Kate Beckinsale and Christopher Walken. Architect Michael Newman's will to succeed at work has come at the expense of quality time with his beautiful wife and children. But then Michael comes into possession of a remote control that allows him to pause, rewind and fast-forward his life just as he pleases Frank Coraci - Director Adam Sandler - Michael Newman Kate Beckinsale - Donna Newman Christopher Walken - Morty David Hasselhoff - Mr Ammer Henry Winkler - Ted Newman Julie Kavner - Trudy Newman Sean Astin - Bill Joseph Castanon - Ben at 7 years old Jennifer Coolidge - Janine Jake Hoffman - Ben at 22-30 years old.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Action comedy adventure based on the 1970s TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu, and featuring Bill Murray. programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. programme.title: The Meg
programme.sub-title: Action, Thriller, Drama, Horror, Sci Fi ║ 2018 ║ 12
programme.desc: Action horror thriller starring Jason Statham and Li Bingbing. After failing to save the crew of an imperilled submarine, deep sea rescue diver Jonas Taylor is unfairly branded a drunk and a coward. Five years later, he spies an opportunity to prove everybody wrong when he is approached to aid a team of researchers in their fight against a giant prehistoric shark Jon Turteltaub - Director Jason Statham - Jonas Taylor Li Bingbing - Suyin Rainn Wilson - Jack Morris Ruby Rose - Jaxx Winston Chao - Dr Zhang Page Kennedy - DJ Jessica McNamee - Lori Olafur Darri Olafsson - The Wall Robert Taylor (4) - Dr Heller Sophia Cai - Meiying Masi Oka - Toshi Cliff Curtis - James \Mac\ Mackreides.

programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Horror, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Underwater rescue expert Jonas Taylor leads a research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean. However, a greedy mining operation threatens the team's safety and unleashes a school of voracious 75ft-long megalodon sharks. programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Liam Neeson. An ageing career criminal and former boxer discovers he has developed a neurodegenerative disease that gives him only months to live. programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the home's past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Federal agent Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken home town after an absence of more than 20 years to attend the funeral of his childhood friend. But his arrival opens up a decades-old wound - the unsolved death of a teenage girl. programme.title: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tech billionaire and gambler Jake Foley hosts a high-stakes poker game between childhood friends, offering them the chance to win more money than they've ever dreamed of. However, the evening takes a turn when he unveils his elaborate plan seeking revenge for their betrayals, and to play, they will have to give up the one thing they've spent their lives trying to keep - their secrets. programme.desc: Swordsman Jet Li competes in a series of visually stunning, action-packed battles as he recounts his defeat of three fearsome warriors. In Chinese with English subtitles. (2002)(96 mins).

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Blockbusting sequel with Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz battling a resurrected Egyptian priest and his evil hordes. Epic adventure. Contains violence/flashing images. (2001)(120 mins).

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: When a heist goes wrong, car thieves Vin Diesel and Paul Walker are hunted by relentless federal agent Dwayne Johnson. (2011)(125 mins).

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Can retired super spy Tom Cruise defeat an arms dealer without his new lady finding out his secret past? Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2006)(121 mins).

programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson is the fearless warrior out to overthrow an evil warlord in ancient Egypt. Epic prequel to The Mummy Returns. Violence. (2002)(92 mins).

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride Or Die
programme.desc: Miami's finest are now its most wanted. Best-bud cops Will Smith and Martin Lawrence go on the run to clear their late captain's name. (2024)(115 mins).

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. programme.desc: The 2019 Bahrain Grand Prix from Sakhir. Ferrari's Charles Leclerc starts on pole after a stunning qualifying session, with teammate Sebastian Vettel second and Lewis Hamilton third.

programme.desc: The 2020 Bahrain Grand Prix arrives from the Bahrain International Circuit in Sakhir. This is the first of two successive races that will be held here.

programme.title: Chinese F1 GP Highlights

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 95/96

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 4/3/96. The Reds faced a crunch game in the title race as they sought to overhaul Newcastle, victory would close the gap to just one point with nine games to go.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 00/01

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 07/08

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 10/11

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 26/11/11. The Reds desperately needed a win to keep pace with Manchester City at the top of the table.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Berbatov
programme.desc: Sam Homewood, David May and Helen Evans travel to London to meet up with Cult United hero Dimitar Berbatov.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Kuszczak
programme.desc: The former United keeper opens up about the risks he took to get his dream move to Old Trafford, and what it was like working alongside Edwin van der Sar.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Rooney
programme.desc: United and England's record goalscorer looks back on his incredible years at Old Trafford; the trophies, the training sessions, the dressing room pranks - this episode has it all!

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Odion Ighalo
programme.desc: The Nigerian striker shares his incredible journey to Old Trafford. Odion also revealed how he used to save up his dinner money to pay to watch United play at weekends.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Danny Webber
programme.desc: Danny talks about his experience coming through the Manchester United Academy and the demands that Eric Harrison and Sir Alex Ferguson put on him at a young age.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Russell Beardsmore
programme.desc: We hear about Russell's pranks which (bravely) were usually at the expense of Sir Alex Ferguson. Watch to the end to find out what happened when he aimed a snowball at the boss.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Gary Bailey
programme.desc: The former United keeper dialled in to the Pod all the way from Miami Beach. He told us how he struggled to settle in to the dressing room at times and how it sometimes ended up in a fight.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Raimond
programme.desc: The former United keeper looks back on his time at Old Trafford and reveals the highs and lows of working alongside Peter Schmeichel.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Ji-Sung Park
programme.desc: Ji reflected fondly on his special years at United and his close relationship with the fans, but he requested them to stop singing his chant, which has offensive connotations to the people of Korea.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Luke Chadwick
programme.desc: Chaddy told us the hilarious reason for once missing a training session and the attempt at covering it up, which landed him in a web of lies with Sir Alex.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Schweinsteiger
programme.desc: Deutscher Fussballmeister spoke glowingly of United's interim manager, Ralf Rangnick, and midfielder Scott McTominay, whose talent stood out to Schweinsteiger when he was training with Reserves.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Stam - Part 1
programme.desc: The Pod team joined Jaap in his hometown of Zwolle in The Netherlands for an extended look through his playing and managerial career, where he revealed how he initially turned down Sir Alex Ferguson.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Stam - Part 2
programme.desc: Jaap talks us through his controversial exit from Manchester United, and reveals that there was an opportunity for him to return to Old Trafford in the seasons that followed.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Kieran Richardson
programme.desc: Kieran dispelled a rumour about a training incident with Roy Keane and revealed why he couldn't wait to retire when he reached his early 30s.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Mikael Silvestre
programme.desc: The former France international looked back on a glittering career at Old Trafford, and picked out some of his highligths from working with both Sir Alex Ferguson and later, Arsene Wenger at Arsenal.
